title: CourtVision
description: Building an automated scouting system for the UCSD D1 men's basketball team to analyze basketball offensive sets run by opposing teams to minimize manual video review. The system consists of computer vision and pattern recognitiion/classification modules, as well as an interactive dashboard that visualizes insights generated by those modules.

title: paper petals
description: A React application built for a local creative mind, showcasing their collection of handmade origami flowers

title: Stage Left: Typing with Parkinson's
description: Parkinson's Disease affects many different parts of the body, including the hands, that can affect everyday activity. Here, we model some symptoms of Parkinson's through interactive typing games. üèÜ Won "Best Project" & "People's Choice" awards! üèÜ

title: Classifying Benign and Malignant Tumors
description: Classifying breast tumors is a common machine learning task. Here, we explore different models and their potential to classify breast tumors using the BreakHis dataset.

title: Bikewatching in Boston
description: Creating a dynamic visualization that visualizes bike traffic in the city of Boston, using Mapbox and Boston's open data.

title: Recipe Representation
description: A write-up of the data science pipeline investigating different aspects and creating a predictive model about online recipes.

title: Siblings on Academic Motivation
description: School is difficult, but can the siblings you frustratingly put up with actually help in your endeavors? This is an in-depth paper researching whether the presence of siblings affects a student's motivation in school.
